item.title: El Corte Documentary
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
[vimeo 28409308 w=500]

I missed this when it came out. A doucumentary about the legendary El Corte in Nijmegen, The Netherlands. Eric JÃ¸rissen and El Corte have had a great influence on the European tango scene in general, and if I am not mistaken, on the tango marathon culture in particular.

HT: Veronica
